alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cowley, southeastern Sedgwick, southwestern Butler and northeastern Sumner Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Udall, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Derby, Mulvane, Rose Hill, Douglass, Udall and Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Kansas.
